trans-unit.source: Enumerates credential types the client can authenticate with when security is enabled in the <see langword="BasicHttpBinding" /> binding.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see langword="BasicHttpBinding" /> 中的安全性啟用時，用戶端可驗證的認證型別列舉。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity.Mode%2A> is configured to perform client authentication at the message level, this enumeration controls the client credential type.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpSecurity.Mode%2A> 來執行訊息層級的用戶端驗證，此列舉型別會控制用戶端認證型別。

trans-unit.source: Both username and X.509 certificate to use must be provisioned through an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> instance which implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityCredentialsManager> extensibility point; in a common default case this is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者名稱與所用的 X.509 憑證都須透過一個實作了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> 擴充點的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityCredentialsManager> 執行個體提供；在通用預設案例中此為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>。

trans-unit.source: The client credential in the certificate case must be specified using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class.
trans-unit.target: 憑證案例中的用戶端認證必須使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ClientCertificate%2A> 類別的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 屬性來指定。

trans-unit.source: The client credential in the username case must be specified using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用者名稱案例中的用戶端認證必須使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.UserName%2A> 類別的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 屬性來指定。

trans-unit.source: In addition, when message security mode is used, the client must be provisioned with the service's certificate.
trans-unit.target: 此外，當使用訊息安全性模式時，必須提供服務的憑證給用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The service credential in this case must be specified using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ServiceCertificate%2A> property on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> class.
trans-unit.target: 此案例中的服務認證必須使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials.ServiceCertificate%2A> 類別上的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> 屬性來指定。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file snippets illustrates how to specify <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageCredentialType>:
trans-unit.target: 下列組態檔片段說明如何指定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpMessageCredentialType>︰

trans-unit.source: The bindings section where we specify the security mode (Message) and the type of credential that will be used to authenticate the client:
trans-unit.target: 繫結區段，我們在此指定安全性模式 (Message) 以及用來驗證用戶端的認證類型︰

trans-unit.source: The behaviors section where we specify the certificate to use for service authentication and the method for validating the client certificate:
trans-unit.target: 行為區段，我們在此指定服務驗證所用的憑證，以及驗證用戶端憑證的方法︰

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a client be authenticated using a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用憑證來驗證用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the client be authenticated using a username credential.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用使用者名稱認證來驗證用戶端。
